ygData.subject: Re: Help finding Brown chitten protector
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The Terrorantula does spawn in S Ro. All I have to say is good luck. He s big enough to sit on 2 sand dunes by himself. And if he doesn t get you, the
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Doug Meade" <DMEADE@...>
>
>That wouldn't happen to be TERRORANTULA would it... believe he spawns
>in Southern Desert of Ro...
>
>
>Thanos, Human Necro the Rathe
>

The Terrorantula does spawn in S Ro. All I have to say is good luck. He's
big enough to sit on 2 sand dunes by himself. And if he doesn't get you, the
hordes of undead, madmen and orcs that usually mob you at this point might.
BUT......... If you're high enough level or in a high level group, you could
probably take them.
